oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Magnolia Blossoms - 1940-06-09 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: NBC syndication Magnolia Blossoms, originating from WSM. Originally broadcast 1940-06-09, part 1. Features performances by the Fisk Jubilee Singers led by Mrs James Myers (Henrietta Myers), and an orchestra led by Pietro Brescia.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Fisk Jubilee Singers; Pietro Brescia Orchestra
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: I Opened My Mouth To The Lord (excerpt) (Fisk Jubilee Singers) -- Test band of orchestra rehearsal -- Theme (Swing Low, Sweet Chariot) -- Announcer opening statement -- [Unidentified orchestral piece] -- Announcer talks -- Deep River (Fisk Jubilee Singers) -- [Unidentified orchestral piece] -- Announcer talks -- Golden Slippers (Fisk Jubilee Singers) -- Announcer talks
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Magnolia blossoms (Radio program); Jubilee Singers; Brescia, Pietro; Myers, Henrietta Helena Crawley, 1878-1968
